languages.text: {n}Преподобный Адальберт тепло улыбается вам.{/n} "О часовне-реликварии я могу говорить часами".
{n}Adalbert smiles warmly at you.{/n} "I could talk about the reliquary chapel for hours."

languages.text: « Je pourrais parler de la chapelle reliquaire pendant des heures, » {n}répond Adalbert avec un sourire chaleureux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert smiles warmly at you.{/n} "I could talk about the reliquary chapel for hours."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert esboza una cálida sonrisa.{/n} «Podría pasarme horas hablando sobre el relicario».

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert esboza una cálida sonrisa.{/n} «Podría pasarme horas hablando sobre el relicario».

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特对你露出了温暖的笑容。{/n}“如果是关于圣物礼拜堂的事情，我可以聊上好几个小时。”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert smiles warmly at you.{/n} "I could talk about the reliquary chapel for hours."

languages.text: {n}アダルバートは暖かく笑った。{/n}「聖遺物礼拝堂についてなら、何時間でも話せます」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert smiles warmly at you.{/n} "I could talk about the reliquary chapel for hours."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert lächelt warm.{/n} "Ich könnte stundenlang über die Reliquienkapelle sprechen."
